class.name: Wind
class.documentation: Wind plotting facilities allow users to plot wind fields as either arrows or flags.

parameter.name: wind_thinning_method
parameter.documentation: Method to control the thinning: data : wind_thinning_factor will determine the frequency as before user : wind_thining_factor will determine the minimal distance in user coordinates betvween 2 winds. the default is "data" for backward compatibility.

parameter.name: wind_thinning_factor
parameter.documentation: Controls the actual number of wind arrows or flags plotted. See main text for explanation. Needs to 1.0 or larger.

parameter.name: wind_thinning_debug
parameter.documentation: Add Position requiered for thiniing [ Debug mode only]
